Lets your [[agent]] return the name of the item in the specified slot.

==Syntax==

: <code>getitemdetail <slotNum: int></code>

==Arguments==

<code>slotNum: int</code>
: Specifies the slot number of items to be counted, slots are numbered from 1 to 27.

==Result==

Fails if the arguments are not specified correctly.

On success, returns the form of the item in the specified slot. See [[Data values|block id]] for the complete list.
